Name: Shop-n-Spree: Shopping Paradise
About the game: Set a course for fast-paced fun in Shop-n-Spree: Shopping Paradise! Your tropical island home has fallen on hard times, but you’ve come up with a plan to turn things around. With the help of the local community, you set out to build and run a series of amazing internationally-themed malls! Serve customers, upgrade stores, and create new items as you turn the island into the world’s premier shopping destination in this exciting time-management game! - Unique gameplay - Fast-paced fun - Amazing internationally-themed malls!
